label: 続史愚抄
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
説明文: A history of Japan from Emperor Kameyama (1259-1274) to Go-Hanazono (1429-1464), written in the late Tokugawa period. It centers on the developments in Kyoto and events in court circles.
